DOC.brief_summary: A randomized , open-label , single dose , crossover study investigate effect food pharmacokinetics JLP-1310 healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Investigate Effect Food Pharmacokinetics JLP-1310 Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized , open-label , single dose , crossover clinical trial .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male volunteer , age 19 year 2 . Body weight 55kg , The result Body Mass Index ( BMI ) less 17.5 kg/m2 , 30.5 kg/m2 3 . Subject ability comprehend study objective , content property study drug participate trial 4 . Subject ability willingness participate whole period trial 1 . Presence medical history concurrent disease may interfere treatment safety assessment completion clinical study , include clinically significant disorder kidney , liver , cardiovascular system , respiratory system , endocrine system , neuropsychiatric system . 2 . Subjects allergic investigational drug . 3 . Subjects medical history affect clinical trial . 4 . Hypertension ( Systolic BP ≥ 140mmHG Diastolic BP ≥ 90mmHg ) , Liver enzyme ( AST , ALT ) level exceeds maximum normal range one half time . 5 . History drug abuse positive drug screening . 6 . Participation drug study within 3 month prior drug administration . 7 . Whole blood donation within 60 day , blood component donation within 30 day get transfusion within 30days .
